item.title: [FLINK-17441] FlinkKinesisConsumerTest.testPeriodicWatermark: watermark count expected:<2> but was:<1>

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: danny.cranmer Hey Danny, do you mind having a look at the issue?
Hey dwysakowicz, I will take a look tomorrow.

I spent a while trying to work this out. I could only reproduce this when the test timed out waiting for records. For now I have opened a PR that will fail the test if this situation occurs again. It will not fix the issue, but it will help debug the root cause.
I will resolve this issue. Since I have switched assertions around if this happens again it will be a different assertion and we can open a new issue
